title: [Bug]: Device settings is blocked
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

I can't select the audio input and output devices.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.12.8

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Launching the app.
I go into the settings.
I can't select the audio input and output devices. The selection fields are disabled. The settings are available in the browsers.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown

```

### Debug

```markdown
16:31:17.297 › DENIED setPermissionCheckHandler check media requested by https://teams.live.com/v2 with origin https://teams.live.com/v2
16:31:17.297 › DENIED setPermissionCheckHandler check speaker-selection requested by https://teams.live.com/v2 with origin https://teams.live.com/
```

### Additional context

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3d32b61f-5660-401a-afc6-f015bc41309e)
